mapper.select: SELECT a.account_id, a.role_id, a.username, a.password, a.salt, a.real_name, a.sex, a.email, a.create_time, a.modified_time, a.create_account_id, a.modified_account_id, a.deleted, r.role_name FROM account a INNER JOIN role r ON a.role_id = r.role_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT a.account_id, a.role_id, a.username, a.password, a.salt, a.real_name, a.sex, a.email, a.create_time, a.modified_time, a.create_account_id, a.modified_account_id, a.deleted, r.role_name FROM account a INNER JOIN role r ON a.role_id = r.role_id WHERE a.account_id = #{id} and a.deleted = 0
